level.text: A violation of any statute, regulation, or Commission order may subject a telecommunications service provider to any of the actions prescribed by D.C. Official Code ยง 34-2002(h-1) (2011 Supp.).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 4664 (May 25, 2001); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 10001 (October 29, 2004); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9020, 9021 (October 21, 2011).
